divs: Sighting DetailsIt was flying in the night sky, glowing an orange-ish color. And before my eyes, it started turing blue and then it dissapeared into the night sky. A couple weeks before I saw that, I saw something similar to that. I was getting the mail at night becauseI forgot to get it in the morning, and then I looked in the sky, and saw a little orange circle hovering and then turned blue and dissapeared. I've seen these UFO's in Mojave a lot. Once also at a party.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Mojave
There were no other sightings in Mojave on or around October 20th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
